name: edh-cube-discover-worker
description: Google Cloud Function for EDH Cube Discovery Worker

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy edh-cube-discover-worker --source . --entry-point main --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-topic YOUR_PUBSUB_TOPIC
scripts.deploy:eventarc: gcloud functions deploy edh-cube-discover-worker --source . --entry-point main --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-event-filters type=google.cloud.pubsub.topic.v1.messagePublished --trigger-event-filters-path-pattern topic=projects/YOUR_PROJECT_ID/topics/YOUR_TOPIC_NAME
